article: Tom and Tim are brothers. They are Australians. They live in a mountain village . Tom is 104 years old and Tim is 102 years old now. They  _  their story in a book called Enjoy Our Life. Here is some of their advice for living a long, healthy life. Get up  early  . They get up at 6:30 or 7:00 in the morning. Have a  _  breakfast. The brothers eat oatmeal , half a banana, bread and eggs with a little cheese .  Take exercise  every day. The brothers like to climb mountains. They also walk on the hills every day. Eat a lot of  _  , especially garlic . Garlic is good  _  your health. Don't eat a lot of salt and fat. These things are  _  for your body .  _  listen to the doctors always. Most of the doctors don't know what to do with us. When something is  _  with us, they don't know how to treat us. They are always surprised to see us to live so  _  .
